oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Names of quilts on Walden's Ridge
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law. Users are solely responsible for determining the existence of such instances and for obtaining any other permissions and paying associated fees that may be necessary for the intended use.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Quilts; Quilting; Folk art; Quiltmakers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: List of the quilt pattern names on Walden's Ridge. The top of the document states, "Names of quilts on Walden's Ridge copied from Mrs. Rawk's patterns." The following quilt patterns are named: Broken Circle, Star of Bethlehem, Old Maid's Puzzle, Twin Sisters, Catch Me If You Can, Rolling Stone, Bird In The Air, The Beggar's Patch, The Wild Goose, Double T, The Arkansas Traveler, and The Hand Of Friendship.
Walden's Ridge is part of Signal Mountain, Tennessee.
